downloadTitle: Microsoft BizTalk 2013 and 2013 R2 Accelerator for HL7 Help
downloadDescription: This page provides downloadable help for Microsoft BizTalk 2013 and 2013 R2 Accelerator for HL7

downloadFile.name: HL7 Installation Guide, Help, and HxS files for BizTalk Server 2013 and 2013 R2.exe
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/f/7/d/f7d3e6fd-b866-4f0e-af8a-b9dfb89ec356/HL7 Installation Guide, Help, and HxS files for BizTalk Server 2013 and 2013 R2.exe

detailsSection: This page provides downloadable installation guide, CHM, and HxS files for Microsoft BizTalk 2013 Accelerator for HL7
detailsSection_file_name: HL7 Installation Guide, Help, and HxS files for BizTalk Server 2013 and 2013 R2.exe
systemRequirementsSection:
• For CHM files: No special software needed.
  • For HxS files: Required software is shipped with BizTalk Server.
installInstructionSection:
1. To start the download, click the Download button next to the desired file.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
    • After you have downloaded the Help files, copy the contents of the download to the \Documentation folder where Microsoft BizTalk 2013 Accelerator for HL7 is installed.
